name: aerisi-kalinoth-pota
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Illustration of aerisi-kalinoth-pota, highlight musculature and unique limbs, include human silhouette, three-color palette, underwater/sky/merged zone, depict motion, detailed concept art, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid embedded text or words unless specified; never render gibberish strings., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Concept art of aerisi-kalinoth-pota with anatomy, scale, and environment.
revised_prompt: Imagine a detailed concept art piece in a heroic tabletop fantasy style, similar to Dungeons & Dragons 5th Edition. The theme is medieval-fantasy with culturally consistent gear, all made from materials you would find in those times with no modern technology or signage present. In this painterly illustration, focus on a muscular, fantasy character with unique limbs, portrayed with a human silhouette for comparison. The environment is a beautifully blended underwater and sky zone, indicating motion. This is aquatic fantasy realism, capturing the beauty of subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents illuminating the pressure-dome shaped setting. The color palette includes predominantly teals, deep blues, sea-greens and pearl highlights. Avoid including embedded text or words, keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins. Steering clear of styles associated with sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI and anime style. Also, ensure to minimize bloom glare and any potential artifacts.
